content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron Plate Factory at position (52.0, -80.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Furnace (position (52.0, -80.0)) 
- Burner Inserter (position (53.5, -78.5)) that puts items into the furnace
- BeltGroup (position (51.5, -84.5) to (53.5, -78.5)) that connects the furnace to the inserter

### Iron Plate Factory at position (62.0, -54.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Furnace (position (62.0, -54.0)) 

### Storage at position (52.5, -82.5)
Consists of a Chest (position (52.5, -82.5)) 

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items from furnace
- Ensure the furnace has the required items to extract before attempting extraction
- Check the furnace's status and warnings to ensure it is working correctly and not full

### NAMESPACE
- No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
- Important variables:
  - `furnace1`: a furnace entity
  - `Prototype.IronPlate`: an item prototype
  - `quantity`: an integer representing the quantity of items to extract
